unsolved: Although informally tested with more than two devices, not enough testing; metal objects and wifi distory the measurements
contribution_desc: Corona is a spatial sensing technique that uses the asymmetry of BLE RSSI distributions to determine relative locations of two adjacent mobile devices that are placed on the same plane.
tracking_accuracy: 50%-85% (50% for top results, 85% for two 2 results)
tracking_characteristic: Inside-out tracking; Location 2D; Tracking devices only
